pageProduct.name: Redwin Antiperspirant Deodorant Aluminium Free Sport 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Feel fresh all day long, with Redwin Aluminium Free Deodorant! Most deodorants use an aluminium active to help inhibit odour. Redwin Aluminium Free with Chamomile deodorant achieves the same results without the aluminium.

What is Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant for?Most deodorants use an aluminium active ingredient to help inhibit odour and prevent perspiration. Redwin Aluminium Free with Chamomile deodorant achieves the same results without the aluminium. This 150ml pump pack smells great and features:- Witch Hazel - cools and sooths delicate skin - A non-toxic, aluminium-free formula - Chamomile - smells great and sooths skin. - Aerosol-free pump pack that is travel-safe.Who is Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant for?Suitable for all skin typesWhen should I use Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant?Daily.Why should I use Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant?Aluminium based deodorants are designed to clog your pores and the aluminium is absorbed in the cells of the body very easily. To avoid putting metals into your body, use Redwin sensitive skin pump to inhibit odour

Suitable For: Suitable for the whole family.

Size: 150ml

Serving Size: n/a

Warnings

Flammable liquid 3. Highly flammable

Ingredients

Alcohol denat. , Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (with hazel) extract, Zinc Phenol Sulphonate (3.5%), Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Farnesol, (0.1%), Fragrance, Chamomilla Recutita (Marticaraia) Flower Extract, Glyceryl Laurate, Benzyl salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Eugenol, Hexyl cinnamal, Hydroxycitronnellal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Limonene, Linalool.Suitable for a halal diet,

Contains: n/a

Allergen Contains: Null

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Pump 3 times under each arm.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Not to be taken internally. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes and open skin. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water and seek medical advice. Do not spray near flame, heat or face. Discontinue if discomfort occurs.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C

Storage Temperature: 25°C
